name: Connect Our Kids - Mobile App
description: Connect Our Kids helps social workers locate relatives of foster children, with the aim of finding a permanent home for these children.
actions: Expanded functionality to enable users to add new child cases and family connections in app
Incorporated MomentJS with new case screen and case details screen to correctly display and format data for GraphQL backend

name: Kansha - Web App
description: Kansha makes it easy to recognize hardworking employees and peers with rewards and personalized messages.
actions: Implemented user onboarding flow and created dynamic feed sidebar on user dashboards using React and SASS
Reached 70% test coverage on PostgreSQL backend with SuperTest

name: Replate - Web App
description: Replate reduces the amount of food waste by connecting food bank volunteers with local restaurants and grocers. Volunteers can accept pickup orders of leftover food to deliver to food banks.
actions: Built a RESTful API in NodeJS with Express, including all CRUD operations
Created persisting database using PostgreSQL, Knex with 100% complete test coverage using Jest
